name: There Is No Breakout
description:
I remade the Breakout section of There Is No Game using the assets from the 2015 Jam Edition and the Web Version. All assets in this game are from said games and are not original.

You should go support the original developers by buying their new game: 
There Is No Game: Wrong  Dimension - https://bit.ly/349u2d7

This is basically my first game, so it's not perfect lmao

Update v1.1:
- The milliseconds on the Stopwatch count correctly now
- Fixed the hitbox of the ball in the Web version
- Fixed issues with wall collisions

Update v1.2:
- Added a slider that changes the ball speed (so you can't get mad at me for it)
- The stopwatch is fixed (again...) as it was somehow slower than real time.
